ComicInfo.Summary:
The Resistance Part 5: Bill Savage and The Mad Dogs unleash their fury on the Volg army, taking up position in Trafalgar Square then moving to their hideout in the Isle of Dogs.
Flesh Book 1 Part 5: First Old One Eye, now "Claw" Carver. Will Earl Reagan ever get a break, and will the tyrannosaur gland save Joe's life?
Harlem Heroes Part 5: Against all odds, the Harlem Heroes win their match against the Baltimore Bulls. As they leave the Aero-drome, the head of Trans-world Networks, Ulysses Cord, offers them luxuries that put Giant on edge.
Dan Dare Part 5: As Dare and Monday continue to explore the surface of Jupiter, the vile biologically advanced aliens attack. When Dare and Monday regain consciousness, they discover they're "inside a living nightmare!"
Probesnatch: While on vacation, Britain's deadliest secret agent is accosted by Otto Brandt who wants the secrets of hyperpower.
Krong: When the curator of a movie special effects museum gets a little frisky with his animatronics, Judge Dredd is called in to enforce the law.
